Comprehensive tobacco control interventions substantial gains decreasing tobacco product use youths . Among U.S. high school students, current use cigarettes declined 36.4% 1997 6.0% 2019 . Although cigarette use youths declined, youths engaged use tobacco products cigars, hookah, smokeless tobacco, electronic vapor products (EVPs).EVPs known names including e-cigarettes, vapes, hookah pens, mods . In 2018, Surgeon General declared e-cigarette use youths epidemic . EVPs use heating element aerosolize liquid solution users inhale. Vaping liquids come variety flavors typically contain nicotine, highly addictive chemical affect brain development (,). Nicotine increase likelihood youths combustible tobacco products increase risk addiction substances (,). Moreover, EVPs deliver additional psychoactive substances tetrahydrocannabinol (THC) . In 2019, vitamin E acetate, additive found THC-containing EVPs, linked e-cigarette- vaping product use-associated lung injuries .Multiple factors influence use EVPs tobacco products youths, targeted marketing youths tobacco industry, appealing flavors EVPs, misperceptions vaping relieves stress, peer family influences, low perceptions harm (,). Other risk factors prime youths experimentation tobacco products substances include social isolation, grief, trauma, stress; risk factors commonly seen COVID-19 pandemic . The 2021 National Youth Tobacco Survey found that, youths currently use e-cigarettes, common reasons use feelings anxiety, stress, depression high buzz associated nicotine use .Continued surveillance tobacco product use youths crucial guiding evaluating tobacco prevention control strategies local, state, tribal, national levels.
